A4.text: Pitt had a much-publicized romance and engagement to his Seven co-star, Gwyneth Paltrow, whom he dated from 1994 to 1997.

A5.text: Pitt met actress Jennifer Aniston in 1998; they married in a private wedding ceremony in Malibu on July 29, 2000.

A6.text: During their divorce proceedings, news media speculated that Pitt had been unfaithful to Aniston with his Mr. & Mrs. Smith co-star Angelina Jolie, with whom he began a relationship soon after the split.

A7.text: Aniston met Brad Pitt in 1998, and their relationship was highly publicized. After two years of dating, they married on July 29, 2000, in a lavish Malibu, California, wedding.
